dmca.title: Notice of Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: BoRyan Eberhard [mailto:beberhard@daviddeangelo.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2005 6:16 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: allen crawford
Subject: Notice of Infringement

 



1453 3rd Street Promenade, Santa Monica, CA 90401

Direct Phone: 310-593-4693, Fax: 877-817-0418, BoRyan@DavidDeAngelo.com

 

 

January 5, 2005

 

 

ThePlanet.com Copyright Agent

c/o Zap3x




            Re:  Notice of Infringement

 

To ThePlanet.com Copyright Agent:

 

This is a formal Notice of Infringement by individual(s) using your hosting
services.  This Notice is being submitted in accordance with ThePlanet.com's
requested guidelines.

 

The physical signature on this page is the signature of the person
authorized to act on behalf of the copyright and trademark holder with
regard to matters of infringement of his intellectual property rights.

 

The work being infringed is the ebook, "Double Your Dating: What Every Man
Should Know About How To Be Successful With Women" by David DeAngelo.

 

This book contains a clear and obvious copyright notice. However, the
parties that are hosting the download of this material, have removed the
copyright information from the version that is being hosted. Accordingly,
the infringement is willful.

 

The retail price of this book is $39.95 and thousands of them have been
legitimately purchased for this price.  Accordingly, the damages that are
accruing as a result of this book being given away without compensation to
the copyright holder by parties utilizing ThePlanet.com hosted sites can be
very substantial.

 

The infringing material is being illegally distributed at least the
following ThePlanet.com hosted URL's:

 

http://www.ebook.za.net/ (specifically,
http://www.ebook.za.net/doubleyourdating.pdf)




My address, telephone, fax, and email information appear as part of the
letterhead at the top of this page.

 

I have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the
copyright, its agent, or the law.

 

Under penalty of perjury, I certify that the above information in this
Notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on the copyright owner's
behalf.




Please take whatever actions are necessary to have the infringing materials
removed immediately.  This Notice is sent without prejudice to the copyright
owner's rights under the circumstances.

 

Please contact me if you should have any questions.

 

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter.

 

 

Sincerely,

 

BoRyan Eberhard

Director, Information Technology

David DeAngelo Communications Inc.
